Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Deficiency of the ninth component of human complement ( C9 ) is the most common complement deficiency in Japan but is rare in other countries .

Let's think step by step.

1. Complement deficiency: A condition where one or more components of the complement system, a part of the immune system, are missing or not functioning properly.
2. Deficiency of the ninth component of human complement (C9): A specific type of complement deficiency where the ninth component of the human complement system is missing or not functioning properly.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

2. Deficiency of the ninth component of human complement (C9)
